content: a simple hat in reverse stockinette stitch - the main body is knitted then the completed hat is turned inside out it is knit with one strand of yarn in the round from the bottom up **sizes** 1 2 3 4 finished hat circumference 43 5 46 5 50 53 5 cm fits head circumference 46-50 50-54 54-58 58-62 cm the sample in the photo is in size 3 **yarn** 1 1 1 2 skeins of eco cashmere from nordic yarn / 100% cashmere / 50g / 150 m / 164 yards the sample in the photo is knit in the colour whisky 80415 **needles & notions** 3 mm us 2 5 40 cm / 16 inch circular needles a set of 3 mm us 2 5 double pointed needles 5 stitch markers 1 unique a different colour to mark the beginning of round tapestry needle **gauge** 24 stitches and 38 row in 10 cm in stockinette stitch on 3 mm us 2 5 needles
